_project.description: 100% Route using Great Eagle Bow with WMC
_project.name: 100% (OmeGEB)

_route: (?=) Questions or Corrections? Join the .link([BOTW Speedrunning discord]	https://discord.gg/94YzaMFZxC) and ask in the 100% channel!

(==) Recommended options (bottom of screen): |
Theme: Granatus | Split Settings: Split on Shrine, Tower, Other.

(!=) .link([Commentated walkthrough of the early parts of the route]https://youtu.be/0YZkmVyhfy4) // .link([Reference run of the whole route]https://youtu.be/Aw14LJhXV-8?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax)

Before Starting: (^=) Ensure the clock is at least a day ahead of any existing saves on your profile.

SoR clip.notes: After cutscene, hold ZL and hop left to exit

_Material<Eat Baked Apple>.notes: Knock it away from the old man to avoid dialog. Make sure to eat it immediately.

_Equipment::Weapon<Torch and Axe>.notes: Sidehop down the hill while grabbing torch to avoid dialog

SAVE.notes: Hard save as soon as you get the autosave on the way to the camp

.!!(System Clock -1 day).notes: If using DST, no need to change clock.

_Material<6 Peppers>.notes: You can eat up to 3 of them

_Material<2 Shrooms>.notes: Get more shrooms on Satori for scrap

Great Plateau: Jump down, BLSS to old man's hut

_Material<2 Endura Shroom>.notes: Save one to cook, can eat the other

_Material<8 Hearty Durians>.notes: Eat 1 right away, cook 4 in castle, and use 3 for IST scrap. You can get 2 more to eat if you want extra healing.

_Shrine::MoggLatan.comment: Right Peg, < aim, backflip WB OR BLSS

Through unloaded gate.notes: Drop 5 Branches, Axe, and Traveler Bow while waiting for castle cutscene. If the gate loads then ESC in or run around the side entrance.

_Cook<Cook stamina food>.notes: Use all your endura shrooms. You may cook an extra meal to help with the Stalnox fight, but make sure you have exactly one when you start IST.

_Cook<Cook hearty food>.notes: Use 4 durians in one dish. Make sure you have at least 3 durians left.

_Chest<Dinraal's Fang>.notes: Run past the malice, down the hallway, turn left, drop down to the hidden room.

_Equipment::Bow<5 arrows>.comment: In box next to lockup wall

Kill Guardian Stalker.notes: Get 1 spring, 1 shaft, 0-3 Screws. Pick up a Core if you get one. Do not pick up extra. Kill more stalkers if you don't get at least 1 Shaft + 1 Spring.

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Skip Ancient Core if you already have one

_Shrine::DakaTuss.comment: Fronthop, Fronthop + Bomb, Neutral hop + Remove Shield, dmg boost; WB up

_Material<1 Energetic Rhino Beetle>.notes: On tree near shop. Make morning if needed.

IST.notes: Follow these .link([Detailed IST Instructions]https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1AVJe_qxlJft2x4Dtv6zVQ9I1-esx9vKIZb9QDUpE56E/edit?usp=sharing). Here is a .link([video guide for the IST]https://youtu.be/0YZkmVyhfy4?t=3245).

Cookpot.notes: Make noon if it's raining. Cook 2 speedfoods (3 lotus + rushroom + fang) if you didn't cook in Kakariko. If you cook here, eat 1 speedfood and 1 stamina food. Keep 2 of each fang.

_Npc<Lady on dock>.notes: Secret of the Cedars shrine quest

Slated for Upgrades.notes: If less than 3 screws, upgrade sensor when you come back later

_Npc<Bolson + Hudson>.notes: Send Hudson to Tarrey Town, fully upgrade house.

_Material<1 Farosh Scale>.notes: Set a campfire and make morning to spawn Farosh 3 times.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Olkin>.notes: At pumpkin patch before 5pm; goes to shelter near northern campfire at 5pm; starts running around the village at 8pm

Eat last speedfood.notes: Ensure you have exactly 40 meals. Unpause and pause after eating.

Drop 10 Korok Seeds.notes: .link([Prompt Entanglement Inputs to hold korok seeds]https://i.imgur.com/SM1lRFn.png)

Roast carrot + apple.notes: Pick up carrot first, then apple

Cook WMC meal.notes: .link([Prompt Entanglement Inputs to hold roasted carrot]https://i.imgur.com/sM2Ced2.png)

Enter Medoh.notes: 1 ancient arrow per cannon. Visual cues: .link([Left-Right]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/293465650540838913/688224174937735188/a3.png), .link([Middle]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/293465650540838913/688224173427785910/a4.png)

.boss(Windblight).notes: 1-cycle: .rune(Stasis) + Ancient Arrow → 1 FDB body + 4 FDB head

WMC.notes: Follow these .link([Detailed WMC Instructions]https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1_x1TgluUOfYzo2eR-L68ObXuBVSsVbmMfghdUgv-Osg/edit?usp=sharing). Here is a .link([video guide for the WMC]https://youtu.be/0YZkmVyhfy4?t=9690).

_Warp::TravelMedallion<-3331.95,-2297.17.notes: This removes your broken slots and re-enables Ravali's Gale. You will load back at H55.

_Material<Luminous Stones>.notes: 10 needed, can get more later. Take any flint you get too.

.boss(Kohga).notes: Clear ragdoll and skew after Kohga

.dir(E) + midair.notes: Wait until Riju's question, then choose "Keep up the fight!" Use minimap to find Naboris.

.boss(Thunderblight).notes: .rune(Stasis), Fire arrows, → 2 GEB body + 1 OmeGEB head

Equip snow boots.notes: If you're here past 4pm: Dalia will start by the stairs and you'll have to wait for her to get to her garden. You can do GSC after Riju to pass the extra time, or just make noon. If you're here past 6pm, you'll be late for the ice house so make noon.

_Npc::Gerudo<Ice House>.notes: Bring ice up stairs, then melt. Stand over it and shoot the top face with a fire arrow to get a consistent size.

_Shrine::KayNoh.comment: Peg High WB OR Shock; Stasis; Mag

_Material<Electric Darner>.notes: Mash A as you pick up the rock

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing to reach Suma Sahma between 4:00pm and 5:30pm. Make noon later in this segment if you're getting there too late.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Intentionally "wasting" a fury. Look for amber, flint, and luminous stones.

.dir(<E).notes: See map or vod for where to drop in

_Korok::W64.notes: Reposition pebble and use to windbomb

_Korok::W60.notes: There is an RNG lizalfos that may have a Moblin Club or Traveler's Sword. Take it to skip getting it later.

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: 4:00-5:30pm. After 4:40pm, you can use a cryo block in the puddle.

.dir(W>) + midair.notes: Place bombs and detonate as fast as possible in wind.

_Korok::N30.notes: Aim with bow to get apples to spawn

Offer .item(Naydra Scale).notes: Shoot the top of the scale with normal arrows to avoid picking it up.

.dir(<E) + .dir(<W).notes: Windbomb .dir(<E) away from the mountain, until you reach the trees on the minimap, and then back. Otherwise, Naydra will not spawn. Make morning at the spot marked on the map, and point the camera up at the peak of the mountain.

_Shrine::MezzaLo.comment: Right peg, Aim at near right corner of cage, low WB

_Discover<Luto's Crossing>.notes: Discover location as you fly over

_Shrine::NeezYohma.comment: Right peg/ledge, Turn right, High WB

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: 7:00am to 8:00pm, Fronk is at the pillar. Otherwise he is .link([at the pools]https://youtu.be/3EltLt0dpks?t=2686).

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Wake with bomb arrow, then use AA. Collect all amber, flint, and luminous stones. If you don't have 10 amber by now, break ores in Eldin and Rudania entry until you have 10.

_Korok::E27.notes: Windbombs won't work during the first of burn damage. Make sure to windbomb either before Link catches fire, or after the second tick. The bow is on a 30s timer to burn up, but it gets reset every time you windbomb or take out the bow and put it away.

_Tod::Night.notes: To talk to Greyson. Must have Flamebreaker Armor equipped to sleep. Make sure bow is not on fire when you sleep or it will break.

_Shrine::ShaeMosah.comment: WB up through hole off barrel

_Npc::Goron<Yunobo>.notes: You can get into the cave before the rocks load in. If you don't, ESC through the back. .link([Example of clip in.]https://youtu.be/s8UMMQmUioQ?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax&t=5167)

_Korok::E06.notes: Ore deposits here for amber if still needed

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Igneo taluses have the best chance to drop flint. Collect drops here and from the remaining three igneo taluses until you have 11 flint.

_Shrine::ShoraHah.comment: Left peg, 90 left, aim right slightly, WB and glide

midair .dir(N>).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Korok::H22.notes: WB away while it's rolling, but don't get too far away.

_Tod::Morning.notes: If it's between 12:00am and 5:00am, make morning twice to properly advance a day for Dinraal.
Look west when sitting at campfire. Facing east can stop Dinraal from spawning.

_Material<Lynel Hoof>.notes: 94% chance to get one, but if you don't, kill lynel near A07.

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: It's common for the camera to not register Kilton. Take 2-3 snaps from different angles to be safe.

_Snap::Quest<Blupee>.notes: If the Blupees run away, you can take a backup picture later at Kakariko.

Look up .!!(East) in the sky.notes: Watch the Salvager chest until it lands, or it can despawn. After it lands, check the weather to see if it will rain when delivering the blue flame. If it will be raining, make morning or noon now to avoid rain and night enemies.

_Korok::A16.notes: Getting the korok will un-smuggle the torch. Carefully jump down without running or pulling paraglider to finish delivery.

.dir(N>) midair to .loc(Lomei Labyrinth).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Tod::Night.notes: For stalhorse, stalnox, and quests after Rudania

Escort Yunobo.notes: Break ores during escort if missing amber (10) or flint (11)

Deliver rock roast.notes: Unequip bow while carrying rock roast to avoid burning

_Discover<Lost Woods>.notes: BLSS should pass through this location

_Npc<Tasho>.notes: Move forward until you hear Oaki's dialogue to trigger the escort. Don't follow Oaki; he'll move along his path while we do the next steps. Note the in-game time that he starts moving; he will arrive at the shrine 5:20 later.

Activate .loc(Keo Ruug).notes: Don't enter shrine or Oaki will reset

_Material<2 Bird Egg>.notes: In tree near Hestu, for transmutation.

Unequip Weapon.notes: The claymore's durability would get overwritten if equipped while pulling master sword.

Follow Oaki.notes: Follow blue nightshades → honey → hollow log → nightshades. Don't get too close to Oaki.

_Material<10 Restless Crickets>.notes: Spin attack grass to collect while walking to Oaki.  Buy at Outskirt Stable if lacking.

_Shrine::DaagChokah.notes: Don't approach until you see the Oaki say: "Woo! I finally made it!"

Korok Forest: Jump into mud to void out

.dir(LW).notes: Glide until the white void stops, then drop

_Equipment::Shield<Rusty Shield>.notes: Keep the shield for a korok later

.dir(S>) + .dir(S) midairs.notes: Need a high-speed windbomb to escape korok forest. .link([Easier movement without midairs]https://twitter.com/TaoPlusPlus/status/1525684201256787968?s=20&t=B-BWPy4MWcQnNr5kUJ9Tkg). Another option is to warp to Eldin Tower and BLSS to the top of castle.

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) If close to blood moon, making night will cancel it while you're in castle and give you enough time to get to Mijah Rokee by 1am. Do not sleep if it's between 9pm-midnight.

_Discover<Zelda's Room>.notes: Run into the room to get location

_Discover<First Gatehouse>.notes: For the gatehouses, there are specific places to climb down and get the location without triggering the Lynel. Watch vod in those places for how to do it.

_Korok::X21.notes: Shoot the top with ancient arrows

_Korok::X22.notes: Aim at top of the wall in background

_Discover<Dining Hall>.notes: Remove armor to load the hall, stay naked until next equip

_Korok::X25.notes: .link([Strat for rain]https://twitter.com/bings_f/status/1576785789534765056) (skip next gale if you do this)

.gale() + .dir(W>).notes: Skip this gale if you used one for the castle bridge flower chase.

_Shrine::NoyaNeha.comment: Take Ancient Axe for Thundra Plateau

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Use .fury() if it's raining (waste the third one)

_Tower::Ridgeland.notes: Equip ancient axe + wooden shield to avoid lightning

_Korok::R23.notes: Complete R24 before the last flower of R23

_Korok::R37.notes: If you already did Mijah Rokee, WB <S far + midairs to R72

_Tod::Night.notes: If you missed the blood moon, skip this. When the next Blood Moon occurs, warp to Mogg Latan and windbomb over.

_Boss::Talus::Stone.notes: Check that it's loaded in before unleashing fury

_Shrine::KaamYatak.comment: 45 left, ledge, turn to reduce height

Ride to .loc(Outskirt Stable).notes: Buy Restless Crickets from Beedle if < 10

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

_Snap::Quest<Forgotten Sword>.notes: This picture is lenient, so long as you zoom in and get the top of the sword in the picture.

Activate Pedestal.notes: Smash an ore and take a luminous stone for easier menuing. Check that you have at least 10.

_Shrine::ShoDantu.comment: Right peg, Aim at right sconce, High WB

_Korok::W02.notes: Keep at least 4 bananas for transmutation

_Boss::Molduga.notes: Moldugas take 2 shots with the OmeGEB

_Shrine::HawaKoth.comment: Set skew outside; Shock; WB; Clip

_Npc::Gerudo<Molduga Lady>.notes: Medicinal Molduga: 2pm to 10pm she's on the steps to throne room, otherwise in training yard. Talk twice.

_Korok::W35.notes: Can use bomb arrow from orb

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Salvager Chest timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

Ride through canyon.notes: The lynels won't bother you if you keep the camera turned away from them.

_Tod::Night.notes: Make night if it's raining or if you won't be able to get to the fountain before 4am.

Look .dir(SE) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

Kill .enemy(Lizalfos).notes: IST leaves us with 8 of 9 required lizalfos horns. Get the 9th one here.

_Korok::L51.notes: Stasis + 2 hits + shoot upwards with Falcon

_Material<Octorok Balloon>.notes: If you don't get one, you can buy one from the shop in Lurelin

_Npc<Start Horse Minigame>.notes: Make noon if raining. Need to finish twice, one under 1:30 and one under 1:15, to get horse saddle and bridle. Can dismount horse to restart if needed.

.dir(E) ride horse.notes: Ride across the pond, a bit past the right fork. Leave the horse there and windbomb to finish the korok. Do not whistle until after the next shrine, you'll come back here to pick up the horse.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: Kill stalnox while the horse is approaching you.

Archery Minigame.notes: To save OmeGEB durability, equip normal GEB for this. Talk to guy while mounted on horse. Need to finish twice, with scores of at least 20 and 23, to get the saddle and bridle.

_Npc<Lady in Stable>.notes: Talk twice for Royal Guard's Gear quest

_Npc<Fruitcake Guy>.notes: Talk twice. In stable if raining.

_Discover<East Post Ruins>.notes: Glide below the height of the pole to trigger the location.

_Shrine::ReeDahee.comment: 2 short wb OR BLSS (left peg aim at left torch)

_Shrine::HaDahamar.comment: Left peg, aim left of waterfall; High WB off rafters

Kill .enemy(Stalkoblin).notes: Need to get here at night, otherwise get the one in Kakariko later.

Mipha's Grace.notes: (optional) Turn off Mipha's Grace now if you want to ensure it's charged for Eventide.

_Korok::L20.comment: Bring to other side of spring

Offer .item(Farosh Scale).notes: Use the single scale, not from the slot with 2.

_Discover<Spring of Courage>.notes: Need to walk out past statue to trigger it

_Korok::F10.notes: If raining, you can use a gale to do this faster. If you do, skip the gale at F28.

_Shrine::ShaiUtoh.comment: Cave behind rubble; Left peg, aim right side of seesaw

_Korok::F48.notes: Make sure you have at least 4 bananas

.fury() .!!(Enemy Camp).notes: Ancient arrow on the enemies that aren't killed by fury

_Chest<Any of 4 Chests>.notes: Use cryo block, treasure at center of rock triangle.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Harpoon Guy>.notes: Take Back the Sea quest. In house if raining.

_Korok::F44.notes: Occasionally the korok will fail to trigger after removing the apple. Come back to it after the shrine and it should be fixed.

_Npc<Old Man on dock>.notes: Select "About the ocean...". Talk twice. In house when raining.

_Shrine::YahRin.comment: Right peg, aim left side post of right scale

_Boss::Hinox::Red.notes: Shoot from above, aim just below upper rim of hole

_Korok::N54.notes: Palm fruit on nearby tree if needed

Letter Quest.notes: Run W and BLSS the letter to the guy at the tent. Fall and don't pull glider, and the letter will survive. Don't fall into water.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Make noon later if you can't get to Balloon Girl by 8pm.

_Korok::C51.notes: Yiga Blademasters often appear through this segment. Kill one for a windcleaver if convenient.

_Shrine::MirroShaz.comment: Stasis normally or shield clip; bomb arrow small block

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Waste a fury if it's not raining. If raining, save a fury to kill the Keese around C09.

_Shrine::NamikaOzz.notes: Make Night for Stalnox if needed

_Korok::R55.notes: If the Lord of the Mountain is awake, reload the autosave from this korok or the stalnox won't wake up. Also make night if you need to.

_Korok::R66.notes: Do the one in the water first, to avoid a weird glitch that can cause magnesis to stop working.

_Korok::R50.notes: Snipe with bomb arrow from high above

_Shrine::KahOkeo.comment: Bomb fan, round corner, WB + pump, glide to end

_Material<1 Cold Darner>.notes: There's another on the bridge to the shrine if you miss it.

_Korok::T14.comment: Step back, aim all the way up

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: Talk to Kheel for Korok Leaf if you don't have one

_Material<3 Spicy Pepper>.notes: Pause+unpause to set menu on pepper for T09. Keep 2 of them for transmutation.

_Npc<Guy at cookpot>.notes: Talk twice. In stable if raining or night.

_Warp::Shrine::ShadaNaw.notes: Make night for Stalnox if needed.

_Shrine::TahMuhl.comment: Through leaves ahead, climb up slope

_Discover<Akkala Bridge Ruins>.notes: Glide through location trigger on the way to pebble

_Shrine::ZeKasho.comment: Far left of ledge, aim at right corner diagonal

Start T06 race.notes: Do H53, H60, T08 while the race timer is going.

_Discover<Sturnida Hot Spring>.notes: Drop down above hot spring, then glide to updraft.

_Shrine::MakaRah.comment: Right peg, aim left side of right torch base

_Tod::Noon.notes: Keep making noon until it's not raining.

.dir(E).notes: Backup blupee picture here along path if needed

Return 2 cuccos.notes: Near shrine and on top of clothes shop

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: Backup if you missed at Shee Vaneer

Collect 5 fireflies.notes: If you miss some and scare the rest away, you can respawn them by warping to Taloh Naeg. They don't spawn in rain.

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Paya>.notes: If she is not crying, then you missed some quest.

_Tod::Night.notes: Staying with Paya sets time of day to 7:00pm. You can skip making night if you need more time to finish the koroks before Lakna Rokee.

Kill .enemy(Yiga Blademaster).notes: Normal arrow + OmeGEB will make him drop the windcleaver. Using elemental or bomb arrows is inconsistent. Use ancient arrows if you already have the windcleaver.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: If you don't make it here before 4am, continue and make night before entering Toto Sah. Then kill the Stalnox after D56.

_Chest<Chest in cave>.notes: Open any 1 chest for "Misko the Great Bandit" quest.

_Shrine::TotoSah.comment: Behind rubble; Right peg, aim at right sconce, catch glide

_Npc::SheikaMale<Man in cabin>.notes: If it's not raining, Calip leaves at 6:00am. Sleep morning in bed if he's not here. Text option 2.

_Shrine::MyahmAgana.comment: Left peg, aim at left front torch

_Npc<Nebb>.notes: Turn in all weapons. Nebb wakes at 8am. He's in his house if it's raining.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Cricket guy + hotel lad.notes: Talk to Prima from behind counter.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Lab Assistant>.notes: Talk 3 times until you get the Hearty Truffle reward. Then talk again and select "I'm good".

Buy compendium pics.notes: If you sold springs last during transmutation and haven't reloaded a save since then, you'll get all the Material pics for free.

.dir(S) (stop, defuse) + .dir(W>) midair.notes: (optional) can use a GALE for more height

_Shrine::KahMael.comment: Under slab; Left peg, aim slightly left and bounce

_Tod::Night.notes: For Salvager chest. Make night if here after 2:30am.

_Boss::Talus::Frost.notes: Wake and shoot, then drop down to korok

_Shrine::RokUwog.comment: Right peg, aim at concave corner

.dir(<<S).notes: Pick up/put down rock and stand on it to windbomb

_Tod::Night.notes: While boulder is rolling. For Stalnox and Kilton.

_Warp::Shrine::DahHesho.notes: .link([Missable Locations]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hN-TJYfVUIlQGkuJYRkK4f0mCPJoIyxW/view). Also missable: Dining Hall, Gisa Crater.

.!!(Upgrade armor).notes: 7 full upgrades: Set of the Wild, Zora Set, Champion's Tunic (.link([Easy Inputs]https://pastebin.com/7neBvwV7))

_Npc::SheikaMale<Rich guy>.notes: Sitting at western end of town past cook pot.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Hudson>.notes: Talk to Hudson again after the wedding

Check quests.notes: 13/15 Main Quests, 42/42 Shrine Quests, 75/77 Side Quests. Two pages of key items. .link([Quests in Order]https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sT8kNvatZR7gfKQrNI2YOg7ARvZIpoRd88a_bTnGOB0/edit?usp=sharing)

_Npc<Guy outside stable>.notes: Park horse near wagon. Talk to guy, cancel dialogue, talk again.

100%.notes: For verification please show (1) map counter, (2) quest logs, (3) upgraded armor, (4) key items tab.
